strings.Value: "I see our travels have taught us nothing at all. Failing to conceal your camp is a novice's error."
"Tonight we'll drown if even the slightest rain picks up. â€” That's if a light breeze doesn't blow our tents away first."
"Quit your whining! You was the first who planted your sorry ass by the fire, so shut your mouth closed!"
"I think it's best I stay put and don't touch anything. Unless you wish to see me accidentally bring down every single tent."
"It's too late for regret now. We should have concealed the camp while we were setting up."
"Why, look at that! Our Lord Alchemist here is scared of monsters! Unprepared to meet a wyvern face to face, ha, ha? Have no fear, we'll protect you..."
